name: Timberland Field Trekker Boots - Men's
description:
With their clean lines and a distinct retro vibe, these urban hikers are at home in the concrete jungle. ReBOTL™ material that contains at least 50% recycled plastic. To date Timberland has helped more than 445 metric tons of plastic waste find new life in their products.Uppers are made from rugged leather and ReBOTL fabric.Leather from a leather tannery rated Silver or higher by a third-party environmental audit. The Leather Working Group judges and classifies tanneries based on energy use, waste production and water treatment.Padded collar adds a measure of comfortable support.Liners made from ReBOTL fabric that wick moisture away from the foot.OrthoLite® footbed and supportive EVA footbed.Aggressive rubber lugs improve traction in challenging conditions.

        Sustainability









                      Leather Working Group leather
